trans-unit.source: Represents a list of items and tasks displayed as a menu on a [!INCLUDE[win7](~/add/includes/win7-md.md)] taskbar button.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma lista de itens e tarefas exibidas como um menu em um [!INCLUDE[win7](~/add/includes/win7-md.md)] botão da barra de tarefas.

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[win7](~/add/includes/win7-md.md)] taskbar provides enhanced functionality for starting programs directly from the taskbar button by using Jump Lists.
trans-unit.target: O [!INCLUDE[win7](~/add/includes/win7-md.md)] na barra de tarefas oferece funcionalidade aprimorada para iniciar programas diretamente a partir do botão de barra de tarefas usando listas de saltos.

trans-unit.source: Jump Lists are also used in the [!INCLUDE[win7](~/add/includes/win7-md.md)] Start menu.
trans-unit.target: As listas de saltos também são usadas no [!INCLUDE[win7](~/add/includes/win7-md.md)] menu Iniciar.

trans-unit.source: You access a Jump List by right-clicking a taskbar button or by clicking the arrow next to a program in the Start menu.
trans-unit.target: Você acessa uma lista de atalhos, clicando em um botão de barra de tarefas ou clicando na seta ao lado de um programa no menu Iniciar.

trans-unit.source: For more information about Jump Lists, see the [Taskbar](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178478) section of the Windows User Experience Interaction Guidelines.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre listas de saltos, consulte o [na barra de tarefas](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178478) seção as diretrizes de interação de experiência de usuário do Windows.

trans-unit.source: The JumpList class provides a managed wrapper for the Jump List functionality in the [!INCLUDE[win7](~/add/includes/win7-md.md)] taskbar and manages the data passed to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] shell.
trans-unit.target: A classe JumpList fornece um wrapper gerenciado para a funcionalidade de lista de atalhos do [!INCLUDE[win7](~/add/includes/win7-md.md)] na barra de tarefas e gerencia os dados passados para o [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] shell.

trans-unit.source: The functionality exposed by the JumpList class is not available in versions of [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] earlier than [!INCLUDE[win7](~/add/includes/win7-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: A funcionalidade exposta pela classe JumpList não está disponível em versões do [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] anteriores [!INCLUDE[win7](~/add/includes/win7-md.md)].

trans-unit.source: Applications that use the JumpList class will run in other versions of [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)], but the Jump List will not be available.
trans-unit.target: Aplicativos que usam a classe JumpList serão executado em outras versões do [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)], mas a lista de atalhos não estará disponível.

trans-unit.source: For more information about the Windows shell and native Jump List APIs, see [Taskbar Extensions](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178479).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre o shell do Windows e APIs nativas de lista de salto, consulte [extensões da barra de tarefas](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178479).

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows the Jump List for Windows Media Player, with items in the **Tasks** and **Frequent** categories.
trans-unit.target: A ilustração a seguir mostra o salto lista do Windows Media Player, com itens no **tarefas** e **frequentes** categorias.

trans-unit.source: ![Windows Media Player Jump List](~/add/media/wpfshell-jumplist.png "Windows Media Player Jump List") Windows Media Player Jump List ## Configuring a Jump List Jump Lists can contain two types of items, a <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask> and a <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpPath>.
trans-unit.target: ![Lista de atalhos do Windows Media Player](~/add/media/wpfshell-jumplist.png "lista de atalhos do Windows Media Player") lista de atalhos do Windows Media Player # # configurar uma lista de salto listas de saltos pode conter dois tipos de itens, um <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask>e <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpPath>.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpPath> </xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask> is a link to a program and a <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpPath> is a link to a file.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask>é um link para um programa e um <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpPath>é um link para um arquivo.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpPath> </xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask>

trans-unit.source: You can visually separate items in a Jump List by creating a <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask> that does not have a <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask.Title%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpItem.CustomCategory%2A> specified.
trans-unit.target: Você pode separar visualmente os itens em uma lista de atalhos, criando um <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask>que não tem um <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask.Title%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpItem.CustomCategory%2A>especificado.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpItem.CustomCategory%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask.Title%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask>

trans-unit.source: This empty <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask> will be displayed as a horizontal line in the Jump List.
trans-unit.target: Este vazio <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask>será exibido como uma linha horizontal na lista de saltos.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the type of the file specified in a <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpPath> is not registered with your application, the file will not appear in the Jump List.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Se o tipo do arquivo especificado em um <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpPath>não está registrado com seu aplicativo, o arquivo não será exibido na lista de saltos.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpPath>

trans-unit.source: For example, if you add a <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpPath> that points to a .txt file, your application must be registered to handle .txt files.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, se você adicionar um <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpPath>que aponta para um arquivo. txt, seu aplicativo deve ser registrado para manipular arquivos. txt.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpPath>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Introduction to File Associations](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178480).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [Introdução às associações de arquivo](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178480).

trans-unit.source: Jump items are placed into categories in the JumpList.
trans-unit.target: Itens de salto são colocados em categorias em JumpList.

trans-unit.source: By default, a <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpItem> is displayed in the **Tasks** category.
trans-unit.target: Por padrão, um <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpItem>é exibido no **tarefas** categoria.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpItem>

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can specify a <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpItem.CustomCategory%2A> for the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpItem>.
trans-unit.target: Como alternativa, você pode especificar uma <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpItem.CustomCategory%2A>para <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpItem>.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpItem> </xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpItem.CustomCategory%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can specify whether the standard **Recent** and **Frequent** categories are displayed in the JumpList by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.ShowRecentCategory%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.ShowFrequentCategory%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Você pode especificar se o padrão **recentes** e **frequentes** as categorias são exibidas no JumpList definindo a <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.ShowRecentCategory%2A>e <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.ShowFrequentCategory%2A>Propriedades.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.ShowFrequentCategory%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.ShowRecentCategory%2A>

trans-unit.source: The contents of these categories are managed by the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] shell.
trans-unit.target: O conteúdo dessas categorias é gerenciado pelo [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] shell.

trans-unit.source: Because these categories might contain much of the same data, you typically display one or the other in your JumpList, but not both.
trans-unit.target: Porque essas categorias podem conter muitos dos mesmos dados, você normalmente exibe um ou outro no seu JumpList, mas não ambos.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] automatically manages recent items if they are opened through a common file dialog box or used to open an application through file type association.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)]gerencia automaticamente os itens recentes, se eles são abertos por meio de uma caixa de diálogo comuns ou usados para abrir um aplicativo por meio de associação de tipo de arquivo.

trans-unit.source: When an item is accessed through the Jump List, you can notify the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] shell to add the item to the **Recent** category by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.AddToRecentCategory%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Quando um item é acessado por meio da lista de atalhos, você pode notificar o [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] shell para adicionar o item a **recentes** categoria chamando o <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.AddToRecentCategory%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.AddToRecentCategory%2A>

trans-unit.source: Applying a Jump List to the Windows Shell You cannot access the shell’s Jump List directly or read its contents into the JumpList class.
trans-unit.target: Aplicação de uma lista de atalhos para o Shell do Windows você não pode acessar a lista de atalhos do shell diretamente ou ler o conteúdo para a classe JumpList.

trans-unit.source: Instead, the JumpList class provides a representation of a Jump List that you can work with, and then apply to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] shell.
trans-unit.target: Em vez disso, a classe JumpList fornece uma representação de uma lista de atalhos que você pode trabalhar com e, em seguida, aplicar ao [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] shell.

trans-unit.source: You typically create a JumpList and set it one time when the application is first run.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, você cria um JumpList e defini-la uma vez quando o aplicativo é executado pela primeira vez.

trans-unit.source: However, you can modify or replace the JumpList at run time.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, você pode modificar ou substituir a JumpList em tempo de execução.

trans-unit.source: When you have set the JumpList properties, you must apply the JumpList to the Windows shell before its contents appear in the taskbar Jump List.
trans-unit.target: Quando você tiver definido as propriedades de JumpList, você deve aplicar JumpList para o shell do Windows antes de seu conteúdo é exibido na lista de atalhos da barra de tarefas.

trans-unit.source: This is done automatically when the JumpList is first attached to an application, either in XAML or in a call to the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.SetJumpList%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Isso é feito automaticamente quando o JumpList é anexado primeiro a um aplicativo em XAML ou em uma chamada para o <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.SetJumpList%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.SetJumpList%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you modify the contents of the JumpList at run time, you must call the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.Apply%2A> method to apply its current contents to the Windows shell.
trans-unit.target: Se você modificar o conteúdo de JumpList em tempo de execução, você deve chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.Apply%2A>método para aplicar o conteúdo atual para o shell do Windows.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.Apply%2A>

trans-unit.source: Setting a Jump List in XAML A JumpList is not automatically attached to an <xref:System.Windows.Application> object.
trans-unit.target: Definindo uma lista de atalhos no XAML A JumpList não é automaticamente conectado a um <xref:System.Windows.Application>objeto.</xref:System.Windows.Application>

trans-unit.source: You attach a JumpList to an <xref:System.Windows.Application> object in XAML by using the attached property syntax.
trans-unit.target: Anexar um JumpList para um <xref:System.Windows.Application>objeto em XAML usando a sintaxe da propriedade anexada.</xref:System.Windows.Application>

trans-unit.source: The JumpList class implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize> interface to support XAML declaration of a JumpList.
trans-unit.target: A classe implementa JumpList o <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize>interface para oferecer suporte a declaração de XAML de um JumpList.</xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize>

trans-unit.source: If the JumpList is declared in XAML and attached to the current <xref:System.Windows.Application>, it is automatically applied to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] shell when the JumpList is initialized.
trans-unit.target: Se a JumpList é declarada em XAML e anexada ao atual <xref:System.Windows.Application>, é aplicada automaticamente para o [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] shell quando o JumpList é inicializado.</xref:System.Windows.Application>

trans-unit.source: Setting and Modifying a Jump List in Code You attach a JumpList to an <xref:System.Windows.Application> object in code by calling the static <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.SetJumpList%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Configuração e a modificação de uma lista de atalhos no código você anexar um JumpList para um <xref:System.Windows.Application>objeto no código chamando estático <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.SetJumpList%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.SetJumpList%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Application>

trans-unit.source: This also applies the JumpList to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] shell.
trans-unit.target: Isso também se aplica a JumpList para o [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] shell.

trans-unit.source: To modify a JumpList at run time, you call the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.GetJumpList%2A> method to get the JumpList that is currently attached to an <xref:System.Windows.Application>.
trans-unit.target: Para modificar um JumpList em tempo de execução, você chama o <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.GetJumpList%2A>método para obter o JumpList que está atualmente anexado ao <xref:System.Windows.Application>.</xref:System.Windows.Application> </xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.GetJumpList%2A>

trans-unit.source: After you have modified the properties of the JumpList, you must call the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.Apply%2A> method to apply the changes to the Windows shell.
trans-unit.target: Depois que você modificou as propriedades de JumpList, você deve chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.Apply%2A>método para aplicar as alterações para o shell do Windows.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.Apply%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > You typically create one JumpList that is attached to the <xref:System.Windows.Application> and applied to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] shell.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Você geralmente cria um JumpList que está associada a <xref:System.Windows.Application>e aplicadas ao [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] shell.</xref:System.Windows.Application>

trans-unit.source: However, you can create multiple JumpList objects.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, você pode criar vários objetos JumpList.

trans-unit.source: Only one JumpList at a time can be applied to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] shell, and only one JumpList at a time can be associated with an <xref:System.Windows.Application>.
trans-unit.target: JumpList apenas uma por vez pode ser aplicada para o [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_mswin](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-mswin-md.md)] um JumpList shell e somente por vez pode ser associado um <xref:System.Windows.Application>.</xref:System.Windows.Application>

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework does not require that these be the same JumpList.
trans-unit.target: O .NET Framework não exige que eles ser o mesmo JumpList.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > This class contains a link demand at the class level that applies to all members.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Essa classe contém uma demanda de link no nível de classe que se aplica a todos os membros.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Security.SecurityException> is thrown when the immediate caller does not have full-trust permission.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Security.SecurityException>é gerada quando o chamador imediato não tem permissão de confiança total.</xref:System.Security.SecurityException>

trans-unit.source: For more information about security demands, see [Link Demands](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [Inheritance Demands](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/28b9adbb-8f08-4f10-b856-dbf59eb932d9).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre as exigências de segurança, consulte [demandas de Link](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) e [demandas de herança](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/28b9adbb-8f08-4f10-b856-dbf59eb932d9).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Shell.JumpList"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Shell.JumpList"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Shell.JumpList"></xref> class with the specified parameters.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Windows.Shell.JumpList"> </xref> classe com os parâmetros especificados.

trans-unit.source: The **Recent** and **Frequent** categories often contain many of the same jump items.
trans-unit.target: O **recentes** e **frequentes** categorias geralmente contêm muitos dos mesmos itens de salto.

trans-unit.source: As a result, applications typically display either the **Recent** or the **Frequent** category in the Jump List, but not both.
trans-unit.target: Como resultado, aplicativos normalmente exibem um o **recentes** ou **frequentes** categoria na lista de atalhos, mas não ambos.

trans-unit.source: The collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Shell.JumpItem"></xref> objects that are displayed in the Jump List.
trans-unit.target: A coleção de <xref href="System.Windows.Shell.JumpItem"> </xref> objetos que são exibidos na lista de saltos.

trans-unit.source: A value that indicates whether frequently used items are displayed in the Jump List.
trans-unit.target: Um valor que indica se os itens usados com frequência são exibidas na lista de saltos.

trans-unit.source: A value that indicates whether recently used items are displayed in the Jump List.
trans-unit.target: Um valor que indica se os itens usados recentemente são exibidas na lista de saltos.

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified item path to the **Recent** category of the Jump List.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona o caminho do item especificado para o **recentes** categoria da lista de saltos.

trans-unit.source: The contents of the **Recent** category are managed by the Windows shell.
trans-unit.target: O conteúdo do **recentes** categoria são gerenciados pelo shell do Windows.

trans-unit.source: To display recently used items in the Jump List, set the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.ShowRecentCategory%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Para exibir itens usados recentemente na lista de saltos, defina o <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.ShowRecentCategory%2A>propriedade `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.ShowRecentCategory%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can call the AddToRecentCategory method to request that the Windows shell add an item path to the **Recent** items list.
trans-unit.target: Você pode chamar o método AddToRecentCategory para solicitar que o shell do Windows adicione um caminho de item para o **recentes** lista de itens.

trans-unit.source: If your application is not registered to handle the file type of the item, it will not appear in the **Recent** list and calls to AddToRecentCategory will fail silently.
trans-unit.target: Se seu aplicativo não está registrado para manipular o tipo de arquivo do item, ele não aparecerá no **recentes** lista e chamadas AddToRecentCategory falhará silenciosamente.

trans-unit.source: The path to add to the Jump List.
trans-unit.target: O caminho para adicionar a lista de atalhos.

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified jump path to the **Recent** category of the Jump List.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona o caminho de salto especificado para o **recentes** categoria da lista de saltos.

trans-unit.source: The contents of the **Recent** category are managed by the Windows shell.
trans-unit.target: O conteúdo do **recentes** categoria são gerenciados pelo shell do Windows.

trans-unit.source: To display recently used items in the Jump List, set the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.ShowRecentCategory%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Para exibir itens usados recentemente na lista de saltos, defina o <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.ShowRecentCategory%2A>propriedade `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.ShowRecentCategory%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can call the AddToRecentCategory method to request that the Windows shell add the specified jump path to the **Recent** items list.
trans-unit.target: Você pode chamar o método AddToRecentCategory para solicitar que o shell do Windows adicionar o caminho de salto especificado para o **recentes** lista de itens.

trans-unit.source: If your application is not registered to handle the file type of the item, it will not appear in the **Recent** list and calls to AddToRecentCategory will fail silently.
trans-unit.target: Se seu aplicativo não está registrado para manipular o tipo de arquivo do item, ele não aparecerá no **recentes** lista e chamadas AddToRecentCategory falhará silenciosamente.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Shell.JumpPath"></xref> to add to the Jump List.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Shell.JumpPath"> </xref> para adicionar a lista de atalhos.

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified jump task to the **Recent** category of the Jump List.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona a tarefa de salto especificado para o **recentes** categoria da lista de saltos.

trans-unit.source: The contents of the **Recent** category are managed by the Windows shell.
trans-unit.target: O conteúdo do **recentes** categoria são gerenciados pelo shell do Windows.

trans-unit.source: To display recently used items in the Jump List, set the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.ShowRecentCategory%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Para exibir itens usados recentemente na lista de saltos, defina o <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.ShowRecentCategory%2A>propriedade `true`.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.ShowRecentCategory%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can call the AddToRecentCategory method to request that the Windows shell add the specified jump task to the **Recent** items list.
trans-unit.target: Você pode chamar o método AddToRecentCategory para solicitar que o shell do Windows adicionar a tarefa de salto especificado para o **recentes** lista de itens.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask"></xref> to add to the Jump List.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask"> </xref> para adicionar a lista de atalhos.

trans-unit.source: Sends the <xref href="System.Windows.Shell.JumpList"></xref> to the Windows shell in its current state.
trans-unit.target: Envia o <xref href="System.Windows.Shell.JumpList"> </xref> para o shell do Windows em seu estado atual.

trans-unit.source: The Apply method sends the content of the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> to the Windows shell in its current state.
trans-unit.target: O método Apply envia o conteúdo do <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList>para o shell do Windows em seu estado atual.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList>

trans-unit.source: After this call is complete, the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItems%2A> property is modified to contain only those items that the Windows shell successfully added to its taskbar Jump List.
trans-unit.target: Depois que esta chamada é concluída, o <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItems%2A>propriedade é modificada para conter somente os itens que o shell do Windows é adicionado com êxito à sua lista de atalhos da barra de tarefas.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can access the lists of removed items through event handlers for the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItemsRejected> and <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItemsRemovedByUser> events.
trans-unit.target: Você pode acessar as listas de itens removidos por meio de manipuladores de eventos para o <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItemsRejected>e <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItemsRemovedByUser>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItemsRemovedByUser> </xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItemsRejected>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Shell.JumpList"></xref> is not completely initialized.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Shell.JumpList"> </xref> não está completamente inicializado.

trans-unit.source: Signals the start of the <xref href="System.Windows.Shell.JumpList"></xref> initialization.
trans-unit.target: Indica o início do <xref href="System.Windows.Shell.JumpList"> </xref> inicialização.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> class implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize> interface to support XAML declaration of a <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList>classe implementa a <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize>interface para oferecer suporte a declaração de XAML de <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList>.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> </xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize> </xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList>

trans-unit.source: The BeginInit method is only called when the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> is declared in XAML and attached to an <xref:System.Windows.Application> by using the attached property syntax.
trans-unit.target: O método BeginInit só é chamado quando o <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList>é declarado em XAML e anexado a um <xref:System.Windows.Application>usando a sintaxe da propriedade anexada.</xref:System.Windows.Application> </xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList>

trans-unit.source: You do not call this method from your code.
trans-unit.target: Não chame este método do seu código.

trans-unit.source: This call to BeginInit is nested in a previous call to BeginInit.
trans-unit.target: Essa chamada para BeginInit está aninhada em uma chamada anterior para BeginInit.

trans-unit.source: Signals the end of the <xref href="System.Windows.Shell.JumpList"></xref> initialization.
trans-unit.target: Sinaliza o término do <xref href="System.Windows.Shell.JumpList"> </xref> inicialização.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> class implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize> interface to support XAML declaration of a <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList>classe implementa a <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize>interface para oferecer suporte a declaração de XAML de <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList>.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> </xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize> </xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList>

trans-unit.source: The EndInit method is only called when the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> is declared in XAML and attached to an <xref:System.Windows.Application> by using the attached property syntax.
trans-unit.target: O método EndInit só é chamado quando o <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList>é declarado em XAML e anexado a um <xref:System.Windows.Application>usando a sintaxe da propriedade anexada.</xref:System.Windows.Application> </xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList>

trans-unit.source: You do not call this method from your code.
trans-unit.target: Não chame este método do seu código.

trans-unit.source: The EndInit method has the same effect as the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.Apply%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O método EndInit tem o mesmo efeito que o <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.Apply%2A>método.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.Apply%2A>

trans-unit.source: EndInit sends the content of the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> to the Windows shell in its current state.
trans-unit.target: EndInit envia o conteúdo do <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList>para o shell do Windows em seu estado atual.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList>

trans-unit.source: After this call is complete, the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItems%2A> property is modified to contain only those items that the Windows shell successfully added to its Jump List.
trans-unit.target: Depois que esta chamada é concluída, o <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItems%2A>propriedade é modificada para conter somente os itens que o shell do Windows foi adicionado com êxito a lista de saltos.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItems%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can access the lists of removed items through event handlers for the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItemsRejected> and <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItemsRemovedByUser> events.
trans-unit.target: Você pode acessar as listas de itens removidos por meio de manipuladores de eventos para o <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItemsRejected>e <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItemsRemovedByUser>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItemsRemovedByUser> </xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItemsRejected>

trans-unit.source: This call to EndInit is not paired with a call to <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.BeginInit*>.
trans-unit.target: Essa chamada para EndInit não está emparelhada com uma chamada para <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.BeginInit*>.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.BeginInit*>

trans-unit.source: Returns the <xref href="System.Windows.Shell.JumpList"></xref> object associated with an application.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o <xref href="System.Windows.Shell.JumpList"> </xref> objeto associado a um aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: You can call the GetJumpList method to get the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> currently associated with an <xref:System.Windows.Application>.
trans-unit.target: Você pode chamar o método GetJumpList para obter <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList>atualmente associado a um <xref:System.Windows.Application>.</xref:System.Windows.Application> </xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList>

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework does not require that this be the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> that is currently applied to the Windows shell.
trans-unit.target: O .NET Framework não exige que esse seja o <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList>que está aplicada atualmente no shell do Windows.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList>

trans-unit.source: The application associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Shell.JumpList"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O aplicativo associado a <xref href="System.Windows.Shell.JumpList"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Shell.JumpList"></xref> object associated with the specified application.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Shell.JumpList"> </xref> objeto associado com o aplicativo especificado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Shell.JumpItem"></xref> objects that are displayed in the Jump List.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a coleção de <xref href="System.Windows.Shell.JumpItem"> </xref> objetos que são exibidos na lista de saltos.

trans-unit.source: Jump Lists can contain two types of items, a <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask> and a <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpPath>.
trans-unit.target: Listas de salto podem conter dois tipos de itens, um <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask>e <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpPath>.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpPath> </xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask> is a link to a program and a <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpPath> is a link to a file.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask>é um link para um programa e um <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpPath>é um link para um arquivo.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpPath> </xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask>

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> is created, the JumpItems collection is empty.
trans-unit.target: Quando um <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList>é criado, o JumpItems coleção está vazia.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList>

trans-unit.source: You can add any <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask> or <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpPath> objects to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Você pode adicionar qualquer <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask>ou <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpPath>objetos na coleção.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpPath> </xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpTask>

trans-unit.source: The collection will only contain items that have been added by your program.
trans-unit.target: A coleção conterá somente os itens que foram adicionados pelo seu programa.

trans-unit.source: After the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> has been passed to the Windows shell by a successful call to either the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.EndInit%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.Apply%2A> methods, the JumpItems collection will contain only the items that were successfully added to the taskbar Jump List.
trans-unit.target: Após o <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList>foi passado para o shell do Windows por uma chamada bem-sucedida para o <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.EndInit%2A>ou <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.Apply%2A>métodos, a coleção de JumpItems conterá somente os itens que foram adicionados com êxito a lista de atalhos da barra de tarefas.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.Apply%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.EndInit%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList>

trans-unit.source: Items that were not successfully added are removed from the JumpItems collection.
trans-unit.target: Itens que não foram adicionados com êxito são removidos da coleção JumpItems.

trans-unit.source: You can access the lists of removed items through event handlers for the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItemsRejected> and <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItemsRemovedByUser> events.
trans-unit.target: Você pode acessar as listas de itens removidos por meio de manipuladores de eventos para o <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItemsRejected>e <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItemsRemovedByUser>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItemsRemovedByUser> </xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItemsRejected>

trans-unit.source: The collection of <xref href="System.Windows.Shell.JumpItem"></xref> objects displayed in the Jump List.
trans-unit.target: A coleção de <xref href="System.Windows.Shell.JumpItem"> </xref> objetos exibidos na lista de saltos.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty collection.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é uma coleção vazia.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when jump items are not successfully added to the Jump List by the Windows shell.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando itens de salto não são adicionados com êxito a lista de atalhos pelo shell do Windows.

trans-unit.source: After the contents of the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> are applied to the Windows shell, the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItems%2A> property is modified to contain only those items that the Windows shell successfully added to its Jump List.
trans-unit.target: Depois do conteúdo do <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList>são aplicadas para o shell do Windows, o <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItems%2A>propriedade é modificada para conter somente os itens que o shell do Windows foi adicionado com êxito a lista de saltos.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItems%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList>

trans-unit.source: You can access the lists of removed items through event handlers for the JumpItemsRejected and <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItemsRemovedByUser> events.
trans-unit.target: Você pode acessar as listas de itens removidos por meio de manipuladores de eventos para o JumpItemsRejected e <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItemsRemovedByUser>eventos.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItemsRemovedByUser>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Occurs when jump items previously in the Jump List are removed from the list by the user.
trans-unit.target: Ocorre quando itens de salto anteriormente na lista de saltos são removidos da lista pelo usuário.

trans-unit.source: After the contents of the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> are applied to the Windows shell, the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItems%2A> property is modified to contain only those items that the Windows shell successfully added to its Jump List.
trans-unit.target: Depois do conteúdo do <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList>são aplicadas para o shell do Windows, o <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItems%2A>propriedade é modificada para conter somente os itens que o shell do Windows foi adicionado com êxito a lista de saltos.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItems%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList>

trans-unit.source: You can access the lists of removed items through event handlers for the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItemsRejected> and JumpItemsRemovedByUser events.
trans-unit.target: Você pode acessar as listas de itens removidos por meio de manipuladores de eventos para o <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItemsRejected>e eventos de JumpItemsRemovedByUser.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.JumpItemsRejected>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Shell.JumpList"></xref> object associated with an application.
trans-unit.target: Conjuntos de <xref href="System.Windows.Shell.JumpList"> </xref> objeto associado a um aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: You can create multiple <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> objects.
trans-unit.target: Você pode criar várias <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList>objetos.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList>

trans-unit.source: However, only one <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> at a time can be associated with an <xref:System.Windows.Application>.
trans-unit.target: No entanto, apenas uma <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList>por vez pode ser associado um <xref:System.Windows.Application>.</xref:System.Windows.Application> </xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList>

trans-unit.source: Call the SetJumpList method to set the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList> currently associated with an <xref:System.Windows.Application>.
trans-unit.target: Chame o método SetJumpList para definir <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList>atualmente associado a um <xref:System.Windows.Application>.</xref:System.Windows.Application> </xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList>

trans-unit.source: The application associated with the <xref href="System.Windows.Shell.JumpList"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O aplicativo associado a <xref href="System.Windows.Shell.JumpList"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Shell.JumpList"></xref> to associate with the application.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Windows.Shell.JumpList"> </xref> para associar o aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether frequently used items are displayed in the Jump List.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se os itens usados com frequência são exibidas na lista de saltos.

trans-unit.source: The contents of the **Frequent** category are managed by the Windows shell.
trans-unit.target: O conteúdo do **frequentes** categoria são gerenciados pelo shell do Windows.

trans-unit.source: To display frequently used items in the Jump List, set the ShowFrequentCategory property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Para exibir itens usados com frequência na lista de saltos, defina a propriedade ShowFrequentCategory `true`.

trans-unit.source: The **Recent** and **Frequent** categories often contain many of the same jump items.
trans-unit.target: O **recentes** e **frequentes** categorias geralmente contêm muitos dos mesmos itens de salto.

trans-unit.source: As a result, applications typically display either the **Recent** or the **Frequent** category in the Jump List, but not both.
trans-unit.target: Como resultado, aplicativos normalmente exibem um o **recentes** ou **frequentes** categoria na lista de atalhos, mas não ambos.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if frequently used items are displayed in the Jump List; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se os itens usados com frequência são exibidos na lista de saltos; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether recently used items are displayed in the Jump List.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se os itens usados recentemente são exibidas na lista de saltos.

trans-unit.source: The contents of the **Recent** category are managed by the Windows shell.
trans-unit.target: O conteúdo do **recentes** categoria são gerenciados pelo shell do Windows.

trans-unit.source: To display frequently used items in the Jump List, set the ShowRecentCategory property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Para exibir itens usados com frequência na lista de saltos, defina a propriedade ShowRecentCategory `true`.

trans-unit.source: The **Recent** and **Frequent** categories often contain many of the same jump items.
trans-unit.target: O **recentes** e **frequentes** categorias geralmente contêm muitos dos mesmos itens de salto.

trans-unit.source: As a result, applications typically display either the **Recent** or the **Frequent** category in the Jump List, but not both.
trans-unit.target: Como resultado, aplicativos normalmente exibem um o **recentes** ou **frequentes** categoria na lista de atalhos, mas não ambos.

trans-unit.source: You can call the <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.AddToRecentCategory%2A> method to request that the Windows shell add items to the **Recent** items list.
trans-unit.target: Você pode chamar o <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.AddToRecentCategory%2A>método para solicitar que o shell do Windows adicionar itens para o **recentes** lista de itens.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.AddToRecentCategory%2A>

trans-unit.source: If your application is not registered to handle the file name type of the item, it will not appear in the **Recent** list and calls to <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.AddToRecentCategory%2A> will fail silently.
trans-unit.target: Se seu aplicativo não está registrado para manipular o tipo de nome de arquivo do item, ele não aparecerá no **recentes** lista e chamadas <xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.AddToRecentCategory%2A>falhará em modo silencioso.</xref:System.Windows.Shell.JumpList.AddToRecentCategory%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if recently used items are displayed in the Jump List; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se os itens usados recentemente são exibidas na lista de saltos; Caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
